examples: BERNADETTE: Wow, you still have it? I just assumed it was balled up in the corner of a barn somewhere.

PERSON: Kind of makes you feel more alive, doesn't it?
MONICA: You had no relationship!!

AMY: Hope your hands are steady. It's the width of a single hair. But this is just biology, so I'm sure it's no problem for a genius like you.
LEONARD: Technically, yes. But, if you'll notice... It's reversible!
LEONARD: We might be starting to zero in on your problem.
LEONARD: Also instead of just living in your mother's house, you could actually live inside her body.

HOWARD: You're right, the party's fantastic. Please, tell me more. I haven't heard enough about it all week because hearing about that never gets old!
HOWARD: Let's not talk about this in front of our friends.

AMY: I'm not saying that you're not fun. You're the most fun person I know.
